devices.no_devices: No devices paired. Use the Coheara mobile app to pair a phone via WiFi.
devices.inactive_warning: Inactive for {days} days. Consider unpairing for security.
devices.unpair_delete_data: Delete all cached health data from the phone
devices.unpair_revoke: Revoke the phone's access to your data
devices.unpair_repaired_note: The phone will need to be re-paired to connect again.
